Subject: How to recover a job without the GUI - a large seed file (7M urls) will not load

I'm running a job seeded with 7M urls.  It ran to about 25% completion, the=
n died.  I'm now trying to restart the job (new job based on recovery-log),=
 but the web GUI is loading the seed list into the browser and it's taking =
forever (hours) and my browser's probably going to crash.  How can I do thi=
s via the command-line or just restart the old job?  I really don't want to=
 start this over from scratch.
